definition: the creation (in mythology and Genesis 1-2)/the first foundational steps
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
Book of Genesis/First Book of Moses

sentences.english: The spirit that hovers over the chaos in Genesis 1, that refers to the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 《创世纪》第一章盘旋在混沌之上的灵，指的是圣灵。
我们的必死命运是与从无创世相关联的。

sentences.english: The Christian doctrine of creation finds its expression within the Church.
sentences.chinese: 而基督教的创世论教义是在教会内得到阐明的。

sentences.english: IT IS written in the Bible’s Book of Genesis that Methuselah lived to be 969.
sentences.chinese: 圣经的创世纪中写到玛土撒拉活了969岁。

sentences.english: IT IS written in the Bible's Book of Genesis that Methuselah lived to be 969.
sentences.chinese: 圣经的创世纪中写到玛土撒拉活了969岁。

sentences.english: In 1995, Dayang launched its own flagship brand of Trands menswear.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，大杨推出了自有旗舰品牌“创世”男装。

sentences.english: So there are seven occurrences of the word "good" in Genesis.
sentences.chinese: 在《创世纪》中，“好“这个词出现了七次。
现在注意《创世纪》中的不同点。

sentences.english: He taught that before creation God made of list of who would go to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他教导创世之前，神已列出谁将进入天国的名单。

sentences.english: In the beginning was the word’.[14]
sentences.chinese: 所以，创世之初就是语词。

sentences.english: In Genesis, God said that sex makes two people one.
sentences.chinese: 在《创世纪》中，上帝说性爱使人合二为一。

sentences.english: This is evident from Genesis 1:1: "In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth."
sentences.chinese: 这是源自创世记1:1“起初神创造天地。”

sentences.english: She supports the teaching of creationism in public schools, alongside evolution.
sentences.chinese: 她认为公立学校应该同时教授上帝创世说和进化论。

sentences.english: Will you be tested from Genesis on?
Parts of Kamchatka resemble the Earth as it must have looked in the early chapters of its creation.
sentences.chinese: 部分勘察加地区想必就像地球在创世初期的样子。

sentences.english: Abundance of starting life mythologies are handed down in our country minority.
sentences.chinese: 在我国少数民族中保留传承著大量的创世神话。

definition: Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
to split heaven and earth apart (idiom); refers to the Pangu 盤古|盘古[Pan2 gu3] creation myth
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
